sentences.en: All right. We'll pull in at the Nancy's Diner.
sentences.cn: 伯恩:好吧, 我们就到南希小吃店停车.

sentences.en: At the diner, Brennan and Booth discuss the merits vegetarianism.
sentences.cn: 晚餐时, Brennan和Booth,讨论是否要素食.

sentences.en: Billy : Sure have. I picked up a freebie from the diner.
sentences.cn: 比利: 有, 我从餐厅拿了份免费的.

sentences.en: Denny Diner serves the best chili dog in town.
sentences.cn: 丹尼供应的红辣椒热狗是城里最好的.

sentences.en: Diner: I'm sorry, I do not know. I'm color blind.
sentences.cn: 食客: 对不起, 我不知道, 我是色盲.

sentences.en: Go and wash those paws before diner.
sentences.cn: 晚饭前去把那双手洗干净.

sentences.en: I am sure today's diner is curry and rice.
sentences.cn: 我相信今天晚餐一定是咖哩饭.

sentences.en: I know a diner down the street that serves a mean liver and onions.
sentences.cn: 我知道有个餐馆在楼下做肝和洋葱.

sentences.en: Let's go to Chucky's Diner and have the double - bacon cheeseburger.
sentences.cn: 我们去恰奇餐店,然后吃 双层 培根起司堡.

sentences.en: The diner signaled the waiters to bring the menu.
sentences.cn: 这位用餐者示意侍者拿来菜单.

sentences.en: The new diner needs another short - order cook.
sentences.cn: 新来的客人又要了一份快餐.

sentences.en: They sat in a corner, away from other diners.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在一个远离其他用餐者的角落里。

sentences.en: This is great diner music asas enjoyable at a predominate volume.
sentences.cn: 这是一首很好的晚餐音乐同时在主流音量下会令人愉快的.

sentences.en: We had our lunch at a diner near the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 我们在巴士站附近的一家餐厅吃午餐.

sentences.en: When asked what a £40.35 meal for five people would cost each diner, they were unable to work it out.
sentences.cn: 问到5个人吃一顿饭花了40.35英镑，每人要出多少钱时，他们算不出来。

trans.tran_en: someone who is eating in a restaurant
